meanings.definition: A substance used to make something wider.
meanings.sent1: The wideners helped expand the road for more cars to pass through.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used wideners to broaden the bridge over the river.
meanings.sent3: The wideners spilled all over the floor, making it wider than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted as a widener, spreading joy throughout the room.
meanings.sent5: The paint acted as a magical widener, transforming the small room into a spacious area.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to increase the width of something.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used the wideners to make the doorway wider for the new furniture.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected the right wideners to adjust the size of the picture frame.
meanings.sent3: The wideners in his toolbox always seemed to magically expand when needed.
meanings.sent4: The wideners worked like a charm, effortlessly stretching the fabric to the desired width.
meanings.sent5: With a twist of the knob, the wideners smoothly adjusted the width of the bookshelf.
